sentences: Graeme Crallan (5 June 1958 â€“ 27 July 2008) was a British heavy metal drummer from Hartlepool, England.
Also known as Crash Crallan, he formed White Spirit along with Janick Gers in 1975.
Crallan then joined up with Tank in 1984, and played on their Honour & Blood album.
He relocated to London and played in a few other bands.
In July 2008, Crallan died at the Royal Free Hospital in Hampstead after sustaining head injuries after a fall in the streets of London.
